package.title: Puzzletube

descriptions.description: (New feature with version 1.3.4: Possibility to delete the third highscore place for C4A) A puzzle game. On a tube! 5th place in the RIOT Tag-Team Coding Competition and 3rd place in the DragonBox Coding Competition. Features: * NEW: Compo4all support! * 5 languages (English, German, Italian, Dutch, Norsk) * New tube based puzzle game idea * 3 Game modes with 2 difficulties * Fancy 3D graphic * Trophies * Great music from Nick May or own background music * Cool sound effects (also from Nick) * Explosions. Explosions everywhere!
